metadata.name: The last man on Earth
metadata.description:
Devastated struggling for survival, looking down upon the last city he had hoped would host living beings.

As he is realizing the city is in ruins and without a single sign of life, he is bursting out in anger from the painful truth.

Fast forward in time / The choices we made / Timeline / Where do we go from here / Rise / Disparition / End of worlds / Left without a trace / One mistake was made / Spaceship / Unobtainable / Human race lost to time, unable to adapt / Did we even leave a mark / Escape / Survive / Envy / Basic human needs / Imperative / This time we have taken a difficult path / Worlds / A path to salvation / Heroes / Good heart / Ideology / You are born alone and you shall die alone / Use your power right / A wise man would have done things differently / Where are we now / Did we leave a mark / Beginning anew / Out of reach / Instincts / Survival of our species / Aspect / Planet / Alternatives / Future / Requiring an answer / Elements / Fall of Civilization / Alpha location / Recovery / Impulses / Consumption / Hierarchy / Solar system / Interplanetary connection / Society / Struggle.

5112x4114 px, 300 DPI.
